verses.verse: From: Paul (an invited missionary of Jesus, the Anointed King, through what God wants) and Sosthenese (the brother).

To: the assembly of God (the one that is in Corinth), invited sacred people who have been made sacred in the Anointed King Jesus together with all the people who call on the name of our Master Jesus, the Anointed King, in every place (both theirs and ours).
Generosity to you and peace out from God, our Father, and Master Jesus, the Anointed King.
I always thank my God concerning you based on the generosity of God, the generosity given to you in the Anointed King Jesus
because in everything you became rich in Him, in every message and all the information,
just as the witness of the Anointed King was authenticated among you,
in such a way for you not to be lacking in any gift, patiently waiting for the uncovering of our Master Jesus, the Anointed King,
who will also authenticate you until the conclusion as people with no charges against them in the day of our Master Jesus, the Anointed King.
God is trustable, through whom you were invited into a sharing of His Son Jesus, the Anointed King, our Master.

I encourage you, brothers, through the name of our Master Jesus, the Anointed King, that you should all say the same thing and there shouldn't be splits among you, but you should be people who have been developed in the same way of thinking and in the same opinion.
You see, it was made obvious to me about you, my brothers, by the people of Chloe, that there are fights among you.
I say this, that each of you says: some, "I am of Paul;" others, "I am of Apollos;" others, "I am of Cephas (Aramaic for Peter);" still others, "I am of the Anointed King."
Has the Anointed King been divided? Paul wasn't nailed to a cross on your behalf, was he? Or were you submerged in the name of Paul?
I thank God that I submerged none of you except Crispus and Gaius
so that no one might say that I submerged in my name.
I also submerged the people living in Stephanas' house. Of the rest, I don't know if I submerged anyone else.
You see, the Anointed King didn't send me out on a mission to be submerging, but to be sharing good news, not in insight of a message, so that the cross of the Anointed King might not be meaningless;
for the message, the message of the cross, certainly is foolishness to the people who are ruined, but to the people who are rescued, us, it is the ability of God.
You see, it has been written, (in Isaiah 29:14) "I will ruin the insight of the insightful people and invalidate the understanding of the understanding people.
Where is an insightful person? Where is an Old Testament transcriber? Where is a philosopher of this span of time? Didn't God make the insight of this world foolish?

You see, in the insight of God, since, for sure, the world didn't know God through its insight, it seemed like a good idea to God through the foolishness of the public speaking to rescue the people who trust.
Since, for sure, Jewish people also ask for an indicator and Greeks look for insight,
we speak publicly about the Anointed King who has been nailed to a cross â€” not only an obstacle to Jewish people, but foolishness to Greeks.
But to the invited people themselves, both Jewish and Greeks, the Anointed King is God's ability and God's insight
because the foolishness of God is more insightful than the people and the weakness of God is stronger than the people.
You see, look at your invitation, brothers, because there are not many insightful people regarding the physical body, not many competent, not many from a good family line.
But the foolish things of the world God selected so that He may shame the insightful people. And the weak things of the world God selected so that He may shame the strong things.

And the things of the world without family and the things that have been treated as if they are nothing God selected (even the things that don't exist) so that He might make the things that exist useless
in order that every physical body might not brag in the sight of Him.
From Him, you are in the Anointed King Jesus, who became insight to us out from God, also the right way, sacredness, and a paid release
so that just as it has been written, (in Jeremiah 9:24-25) "The person who brags must brag about the Master."
